channel.title: Windows Notes on rowstu.net
channel.description: Recent content in Windows Notes on rowstu.net

item.title: Cli
item.description:
Windows CLI commands that have similar functionality to Linux utilities

sed find and replace

Get-Content file.txt | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace 'old', 'new' } | Set-Content file.txt

awk split a csv

Get-Content file.txt | ForEach-Object { $_.Split(",")[1] }

grep in cmd.exe

findstr "search_term" file.txt

grep in powershell.exe

Select-String -Pattern "search_term" -Path file.txt

curl

Invoke-WebRequest -Uri https://example.com -OutFile file.html

find

# cmd
dir /s /p "filename"
# ps
Get-ChildItem -Path C:\ -Recurse -Filter "*.txt"

start/stop services

# cmd
net start "ServiceName"
net stop "ServiceName"
# ps
Start-Service -Name "ServiceName"
Stop-Service -Name "ServiceName"
Restart-Service -Name "ServiceName"
Get-Service -Name "ServiceName"

logs

item.title: Windows11
item.description:
Windows 11 notes

Bypass network requirement on setup. Press Shift+F10 to bring up the command prompt and enter:

oobe\bypassnro
